sentences.en: In 1993, and the enactment of the special nutrition labeling of foods.
sentences.cn: 1993年, 又制定了《特殊营养食品标签》.

sentences.en: Meeting 12. Fund and accounting 13. Enactment and revision of articles.
sentences.cn: 一一会议. 一二经费与会计. 一三章程之订定及修改.

sentences.en: Or of relating to the enactment of laws.
sentences.cn: 或是关系到法律的条款.

sentences.en: Since original enactment in 1946, the Administrative Act has been amended and recodified several times.
sentences.cn: 自从1946年的初次制定以来, 《行政程序法》已经过了若干次的修订和重新编纂.

sentences.en: Teacher's curriculum enactment TCE is derived from and beyond the enactment of curriculum implementation.
sentences.cn: “教师的课程创生”源于但又超越“课程实施的创生”.

sentences.en: Teachers curriculum enactment TCE intends to explain the intrinsic relationship between the teacher and curriculum.
sentences.cn: “教师课程创生”这一命题意在回答“教师与课程的内在关系”.

sentences.en: The enactment of this regulation gives us discretionary power.
sentences.cn: 这个法规的颁布,犹如给我们配备了上方宝剑.

sentences.en: The game is a simple, playful enactment of a horrible scene that might occur in accidents.
sentences.cn: 该游戏玩法简单 、 逼真,演绎了事故发生的紧张场面.

sentences.en: The main building was also used for the enactment of mystery plays.
sentences.cn: 主楼还用于神秘剧的演出。

sentences.en: To guide and organize the enactment or formulation of norms and standards for coal sector.
sentences.cn: 指导和组织制定或拟订煤炭行业规范和标准工作.

sentences.en: Two notable regulatory changes resulted from enactment of Pub. L . 96 - 295.
sentences.cn: 在颁布的《公法》96—295条中,有两项改动引起人们的注意.

sentences.en: We support the call for the enactment of a Bill of Rights.
sentences.cn: 我们支持《权利法案》制定的呼吁。

trans.tran_en: The enactment of a law is the process in a legislature by which the law is agreed upon and made official
